page.title: 16SW BASINGSTOKE: LOCAL NEWS
page.content:
CLIDDESDEN VILLAGE NEWSLETTER BASINGSTOKE GAZETTE EXTRA THE STANDARD HILL AND DALE RADIO 210
These are the sources of news. Here are a few items that have been mentioned.The history of the village church service. The VE day celebrations.Hackwood Park Spring Wood open day. Fund raising for the heart foundation. Eight children and their teacher were taken to hospital after an acid explosian during a chemistry lesson. Annual Horticultral show at Cliddesden school. The harvest supper is being held at Ellisfield in October. Houses are on sale at Kempshott for Â£58,500. Also there is a house for sale at Brighton Hill for Â£37,950.
